answers.answer: Your growing a baby, your weight sounds fine girl :) I've put on 45lbs this pregnancy but our doctors would say if it's unhealthy! It's hard not to worry about it though I understand
As long as you're eating healthily :D
I don't think your gaining too much cuz I'm 5'4 and in the 200's so I could only gain 10-15 u should be fine .
I am 16 weeks and gain 14 lbs too and I am eating right and drinking a gallon a water a day. I just walk when I can for 45 minutes or so and pray for a healthy baby.
I put on around 60 with my second. They won't say anything unless you're health or baby's is at risk. like gestational diabetes. Don't worry too much about it.
Im 5.4 and before getting pregnant I was 140 now at 31 weeks almost 32 im 162 im having a girl too .
Dnt stress about the your weight I was like that too until my dc said I was fine . Goodluck
Thank you all made me feel better about it.
I was 140 pounds  before pregnancy and now im 28 weeks and im 151pound's

I'm 5'4" and weighed 160 before I got pregnant. I'm now 32+4 days and I've only put on 7 pounds throughout my entire pregnancy. I figured it would be a lot easier to gain weight but I'm really struggling. I eat nonstop And I've always had a slow metabolism. I'm sure after I have my baby, all the weight I thought I would've gained will probably come bite me in the butt lol.

Im...5'2 and 6 monthsI weighed 116 on 4 weeksNow I'm 144...my doctors say I'm gaining way too fast..and said I should cut down on the surgery stuff...which is funny because I actually hate most sweets since my pregnancy.
My doctor hasn't said anything, But I got a appointment tomorrow so. Hopefully Shell lemme know if I'm a healthy weight

question: Im 5"3 maybe 5"4 and i feel like ive gained too much. My doctor hasnt said anything about it. But before i was pregnant i was about 145-150 or so. Something in thay range. I cant remember. But at 10.4 weeks i was 152. Then now at 14.1 weeks im 160. Im also showing alot bc im habing a girl lol. But anyways. Do yall think ive gained too much??
title: need yalls opinion??!!
